metadata.name: Detected Windows Software Discovery - PowerShell
metadata.comment: Adversaries may attempt to enumerate software for a variety of reasons, such as figuring out what security measures are present or if the compromised system has a version of software that is vulnerable.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-itemproperty')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('\\\\software\\\\')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('select-object')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('format-table')))

output.summary: Adversaries may attempt to enumerate software for a variety of reasons, such as figuring out what security measures are present or if the compromised system has a version of software that is vulnerable.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1518/T1518.md, https://github.com/harleyQu1nn/AggressorScripts
